name: Me, by me
description:
"I...I don't remember who I am, I don't remeber where i came from, I don't even know what happened...You call it ... what was the name? was it Alzheimer? 

Can you help me remember? Help me find my stuffs, so maybe I can tell you my story."

Me, by Me is a point and click game where you need to help a man to remember who he is, or not...

Click with the mouse at the objects that are asked in the screen.
